summary: The "County of Osijek-Baranja" is a significant administrative region within Croatia, classified under the category of 7211 regions of EU Member States. This region plays a crucial role in local governance and the implementation of EU regulations at the regional level. As part of the broader EU framework, the County of Osijek-Baranja is subject to various legal and regulatory provisions that aim to promote regional development, ensure compliance with EU standards, and facilitate cross-border cooperation. Its governance structures are aligned with EU principles, enhancing its capacity to engage in socio-economic initiatives and contribute to the overall cohesion policy of the European Union.
